bibl.title: The Ancient Door of St. Barbara Church in Misr al Qadeima.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Cairo, Copric Museum, Inv. 728. Carved sycomore door (representations of Lord Christ, the Holy Virgin and the Apostles). IV/V century.
bibl.seg: GIRGIS Girgis Daoud, The Ancient Door of St. Barbara Church in Misr al Qadeima.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 42 (2003) p. 7 et pll. I-IV.
